column4: Hello. Is it possible to upgrade to the alpha release of 7.04 without having to download the ISO file ?
yes, change edgy to feisty in sources.list and apt-get update && apt-get dist-upgrade
a better alternative is to change sources.list and run teh graphical update manager.. it will tell you a distrobution upgrade is available
be aware that it may break your system and you may loose files if you upgrade to feisty
